title: TTT Batch 2: Schedule F Federal Worker Reclassification and Mass Firings
description: Systematic analysis of Schedule F implementation for mass federal worker reclassification and loyalist hiring based on Trump Tyranny Tracker documentation. Found 22 instances across articles 46-90. Research federal worker targeting mechanisms, reclassification processes, loyalty testing programs, and mass firing campaigns. Focus on specific agencies targeted, timeline of implementation, and resistance mechanisms.
